F. Oliver Gathmann - main developer
Cenix BioScience, Dresden, Germany

Nikolaos Papagrigoriou - initial architecture and prototype
Amadeus, Munich, Germany

Tobias Rothe - Flex filter
Cenix BioScience, Dresden, Germany
 
Part of this work was funded under an EuroTransBio grant by the European Union
and the BMBF in Germany.
